DOC.brief_title: Non-Significant Risk Feasibility Study Assess Retention Replacement OTX Punctum Plug
DOC.criteria: Subject must great equal 40 year age . Subject general good health overall healthy eye . Subject inform nature study able comply study requirement , visit schedule provide write informed consent , approve appropriate IRB . Presence uncontrolled systemic debilitating disease ( e.g . cardiovascular disease , hypertension , diabetes , cystic fibrosis ) . History ocular trauma within past 6 month either eye . History ocular infection ( bacterial , viral , fungal ) ocular inflammation within 3 month prior study either eye . History chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease ( i.e. , iritis , scleritis , uveitis , herpes keratitis ) either eye . History clinically relevant progressive retinal disease retinal detachment , retinal degeneration , diabetic retinopathy either eye . History severe ocular pathology ( include severe dry eye ) either eye . History laser incisional surgery within 6 week prior study schedule ocular surgery study .
